notes: Grind the ingredients together a put in an amber bottle with an airtight lid.Pour in the sesame oil and steep for 5 days. Transfer the solution into a nonmetallic saucepan and heat until the ingredients turn brown. Remove the dregs and add dissolved beeswax. Reheat if necessary. Pour the solution into the previously used amber bottle and allow to congeal. Apply 2-3 times daily by rubbing gently into the lesions.
